title: Hard champions and easy champions
body: So I just watched Jeremy do a video on learning a hard champion doing all this maths and stuff. I was just wondering if there is a site which tells you your win rate on a certain champion, how much you've improved and all that good stuff. Something that goes really in depth on your progression thanks.

replies.body: learning a hard champ, sees yasuo and sol mentioned... derp

I wouldn't say Sol is easy though, although Riot ranks his difficulty as low he isn't a super piece of cake champion to learn - or at least, to play well with.

As for a site like this I unfortunately don't know any they cater to your exact needs, but [LolKing](http://www.lolking.net/) does have decent ratings on champion difficulties and such. (Champions > view 'popularity' and 'win rate').
